attributes.action: Stop building on Green Belt land in rural environments.
attributes.additional_details:
Evidence is found in the following areas:
Green belt land
Conservation
Flooding
Lack of adequate amenities
Drainage
attributes.background: This is in direct response to Central Bedfordshire Council’s planning permission received for building on protected Green Belt land off Eaton Park, Eaton Bray, Bedfordshire. This needs to be stopped before urban sprawl decays our Countryside and rural environment forever.
